ValidationRule.description:
Details required to be filled to move Gate to Opportunity.
-- Created as part of CR00032940 | IT-REQ-1779
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
ISPICKVAL( Gate__c, 'Opportunity' ) && ( ISBLANK( Problem_Statement__c ) || ISBLANK( Approved_Requestor__c ) || ISNULL( Annual_Revenue_Gain__c ) || ISPICKVAL( Magnitude_of_Business_Impact__c , '') || ISNULL( Annual_Baseline_Time_Hours__c ) || ISNULL( Annual_Time_Savings_Hours__c ) || ISNULL( Annual_Business_Savings__c ) || ISNULL( Annual_IT_Savings__c ) || ISNULL( Annual_Revenue_Loss_Avoidance__c ) || ISNULL( Annual_Cost_Avoidance__c ) || ISPICKVAL( Business_Risk_Severity__c , '') ||
(ISPICKVAL( Business_Risk_Likelihood__c , '') && NOT(ISPICKVAL( Business_Risk_Severity__c , 'No impact')) ) ||
ISPICKVAL( Strategic_Priorities__c , '') ||
(ISPICKVAL( Driver_Goals__c , '') && NOT(ISPICKVAL( Strategic_Priorities__c , 'Not applicable')) ) ||
ISNULL( Submit_Date__c ) ||
AND( ISPICKVAL( Strategy__c , ''), OR( ISPICKVAL( ELT_Area__c, 'Operations'), ISPICKVAL( ELT_Area__c, 'Quality'), ISPICKVAL( ELT_Area__c, 'Regulatory') ) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please fill in all the details under IDEA section in order to move Gate to Opportunity.
